A1 used instead of "a" when the following word begins with a vowel sound: an orange an honour an easy question an interesting story
More examplesFewer examplesHe applied to become an American citizen.Chris has an evening job as an office cleaner.That was an excellent meal!There's been an accident - dial 999 and ask for an ambulance.Let the fish cook for half an hour before you add the wine.
